DOC.brief_summary: Tracheostomy worldwide perform Intensive Care Unit ( ICU ) . According current literature , indication percutaneous tracheostomy ( PDT ) ICU : difficult prolonged weaning , prolong mechanical ventilation , loss airway reflex , copious secretion , upper airway obstruction . Many study focus comparison different PDT technique complication . The aim study evaluate procedural feature , complication , ICU mortality , quality life , post-discharge mortality patient undergoing different PDT technique perform ICU .
DOC.brief_title: Procedures Follow-up Percutaneous Tracheostomy Intensive Care Unit
DOC.criteria: age > 18 indication tracheostomy infectious disease neck
